attributes.title: this is the worst app ever!!!
attributes.review: I hate this app so much it causes so much pain and it’s just so offensive and I just can’t believe that it’s allowed to even be a thing. I don’t understand why we have a clown is our president and I don’t understand why this app is allowed. This is the most slow dumb and disgusting thing I’ve ever seen🤮🤮.

attributes.title: Fake
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it took forever to download about seven hours. After finally downloaded I could even sign in or sign up as a blank screen. Next thing you know all of my other apps are gone! Then the app started playing the N-word over and over again!

attributes.title: Wow really...?
attributes.review: This app is terrible! When I first downloaded it I thought I would be able to use it and worship our orange 🍊 man 🍊🍊🍊🍊but it’s not worth downloading! I opened the app and immediately was blinded by a bright light emanating from my screen. It gave me visions and I blacked out. Trump administration is lucky that I am not suing... wish I could rate 0 stars. 😔

attributes.title: 🥱Dis is the worst app ever🥱
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever I opened the app and a whole bunch of adds popped up and it started to glitch and all type of things🥱 and then when I wanted to see trumps plans the app literally made me leave🙄 like it stopped my phone and then my phone started freezing up like are you serious 🥱

attributes.title: i hate this
attributes.review: i went into the app and it didn’t instantly make america great again. 0/10 start delete this app please, it’s almost as bad as the jerry springer app but at least jerry springer is hot. Mr. trump please don’t promise something that you can’t do *cough* which is making america great again cause right now we kinda falling into a hole *cough*.

attributes.title: I am in shock.
attributes.review: This is by far the worst application I have downloaded ever. I am extremely disappointed. No I’m not here just because of the Tiktok thing. But because this app is horribleeee. The notifications won’t stop. I constantly get random notifications and it’s so annoying. Delete this app. Thank you

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: it asked me to pay after waiting 48 hours to load when I signed in it is a terrible app and when it asked me to it said to donate 1,000,000 dollars which I don’t have that kind of money plus just to read the NEWS. Hell no im just gonna watch the news. Don’t download this app. Thank You

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: i’m in tears. yes tears with this TOE CRUNCHING APP. why’d i ever support an app that brings me nothing but a ✨headache✨thanks to cheeto man i am currently having to reload my phone through my computer because it keeps crashing then ruining my phone. my photos disappear, the news i do get from it is usually not easily trusted. i’m disgusted. sorry no. next caller

attributes.title: this is trash
attributes.review: Trump is absolutely racist and i honestly have no idea why people support him. i want this to be taken down because there is absolutely no reason for an awful person to have an entire app supporting them. i don’t understand why he says all this racist stuff, but please take this app down.

attributes.title: just a bad app. no sugarcoating
attributes.review: I downloaded to look at his policies and look at his campaign but the app glitches like no other, and constantly kicks me out. It’s gotten to the point that I think it’s interfering with the speed at which my phone can process things. honestly don’t download this, and don’t vote for him:)
